author: Slidebean
description:
Mark Zuckerberg ran an illegal preschool at his house.

According to recent reports, Mark Zuckerberg has been operating an unlicensed K-4 school out of his Palo Alto mega compound, named after his pet chicken.

Neighbors complained about noise, investigators found a full school setup, staff, and expansions built without zoning permits.

Parents actually paid to have their kids taught by the world’s most emotionally neutral billionaire.

It’s basically homeschooling but make it billionaire edition.

👉Hear the full breakdown on The Slidebean Stand-Up; streaming now on Spotify, Apple Podcasts, and all major podcast platforms.
title: Zuckerberg’s secret preschool is real and illegal
